text: @SpeakerPelosi Democrats & their media puppets deliberately created hysteria over #COVID19  Sadly, people believed the lies and didn't bother to watch legitimate reporting.  @CNN @MSNBC @NBC etc. are all part of the corrupt cabal.  They report what they are TOLD to report.  No integrity!
